description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in index.php for Kayako ESupport 2.3.1, and possibly other versions, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary HTML and web script via the nav parameter.

description: Buffer overflow in the MoxaDriverIoctl function for the moxa serial driver (moxa.c) in Linux 2.2.x, 2.4.x, and 2.6.x before 2.6.22 allows local users to execute arbitrary code via a certain modified length value.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-0504

description: Unknown vulnerability in Information Resource Manager (IRM) before 1.5.2.1 allows remote attackers to have "potentially serious" impact, related to LDAP logins.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-0505

description: The Avaya IP Office Phone Manager, and other products such as the IP Softphone, stores sensitive data in cleartext in a registry key, which allows local and possibly remote users to steal usernames and passwords and impersonate other users via keys such as Avaya\IP400\Generic.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-0506

description: Directory traversal vulnerability in SD Server 4.0.70 and earlier allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via .. sequences in an HTTP request.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-0507

description: Unknown vulnerability in Squiggle for Batik before 1.5.1 allows attackers to bypass certain access controls via certain features of the Rhino scripting engine due to a "script security issue."

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-0508

description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in the Mono 1.0.5 implementation of ASP.NET (.Net) allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary HTML or web script via Unicode representations for ASCII fullwidth characters that are converted to normal ASCII characters, including ">" and "<".

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-0509

description: The daemon for fallback-reboot before 0.995 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (daemon exit), possibly related to verbose debug messages when the daemon is not on a tty.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-0510

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Solaris AnswerBook2 Documentation 1.4.4 and earlier allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the Search function.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-0548

description: Firefox before 1.0.1 and Mozilla before 1.7.6 truncates long sub-domains or paths for display, which may allow remote malicious web sites to spoof legitimate sites and facilitate phishing attacks.
